name: Lenovo 300 USB Wired Computer Full Size Optical Ambidextrous Mouse with 1600 DPI, Reliable USB-A Wired Connection, Easy 3-Button Navigation – Long Lasting, Durable Basic Mouse, Black
short_description: Long-Lasting Durability: Equipped with microswitches rated for up to 20 million clicks, this wired mouse ensures enduring performance and reliability. The left/right buttons are rated for up to 3,000,000 clicks and the scroll for up to 1,000,000 clicks, ensuring extensive long-term usage

Streamlined 3-Button Design: Navigate effortlessly with a simple and convenient 3-button layout, including a clickable scroll wheel for intuitive and efficient control, no matter your task
product_description: The Lenovo 300 USB Mouse is perfect for the office, school, or home – anywhere that you need a computer mouse that just works. Simple and easy to use, this USB optical mouse sports a clean and streamlined design that feels just right in the hand. The ergonomic full-size design provides a comfortable grip for all-day comfort. This USB mouse offers an ambidextrous shape, so it's easy to use with either the left or right hand. An easy plug-and-play connection to PCs, this corded USB mouse requires no setup time. Just take it out of the box, plug it in, and you're ready to go! This computer mouse offers 3 buttons (left click, right click, and scroll click) and an up/down scroll wheel for easy control. Plus, with a 1600 DPI resolution, you'll have great cursor control whether you're shopping online, playing your favorite games, or staying productive at work. The Lenovo 300 USB optical mouse is ideal for desktop or laptop computers.

product_description: How to connect: Step1:open the battery cover,then install the two AAA battery . Step2:Take out the USB dongle and close the battery cover . Step3:Plug the USB dongle in the USB port . Step4:Place your wireless mouse close to the dongle about 30CM,turn the power switch button to "ON", the led light will light up.Your mouse will connect with the dongle automatically and start working . Notice if the mouse doesn't work ,please place the mouse near to the dongle and press the connect button (underneath the mouse)and release ,it wll connect to work . Package details Wireless mouse x1 USB nano receiver x1
